PropertyDef.Name: LongitudinalSeam
PropertyDef.Definition: The type of seam to be used along the longitudinal axis of the duct segment.

PropertyDef.Name: NominalDiameterOrWidth
PropertyDef.Definition: The nominal diameter or width of the duct segment.

PropertyDef.Name: NominalHeight
PropertyDef.Definition: The nominal height of the duct segment.

PropertyDef.Name: PressureRange
PropertyDef.Definition: Allowable maximum and minimum working pressure (relative to ambient pressure).

PropertyDef.Name: Reference
PropertyDef.Definition: Reference ID for this specified type in this project (e.g. type 'A-1').

PropertyDef.Name: Reinforcement
PropertyDef.Definition: The type of reinforcement, if any, used for the duct segment.

PropertyDef.Name: Shape
PropertyDef.Definition: Cross sectional shape. Note that this shape is uniform throughout the length of the segment. For nonuniform shapes, a transition fitting should be used instead.

PropertyDef.Name: Status
PropertyDef.Definition: Status of the element, predominately used in renovation or retrofitting projects. The status can be assigned to as "New" - element designed as new addition, "Existing" - element exists and remains, "Demolish" - element existed but is to be demolished, "Temporary" - element will exists only temporary (like a temporary support structure).

PropertyDef.Name: WorkingPressure
PropertyDef.Definition: Pressure classification as defined by the authority having jurisdiction (e.g., SMACNA, etc.).
